complete_test_script.bash_script:
#!/bin/bash

# Test script for Food Agent place details endpoint
echo "Testing Food Agent Place Details Endpoint"

BASE_URL="http://localhost:8000"

# Test 1: Health check
echo "\n1. Testing health check..."
curl -X GET "$BASE_URL/health"

# Test 2: Get recommendations to obtain place IDs
echo "\n\n2. Getting recommendations to find place IDs..."
RECOMMENDATIONS=$(curl -s -X POST "$BASE_URL/recommendations" \
  -H "Content-Type: application/json" \
  -d '{"latitude": 19.0760, "longitude": 72.8777, "radius": 2000, "limit": 3}')

echo "$RECOMMENDATIONS" | jq '.' 2>/dev/null || echo "$RECOMMENDATIONS"

# Test 3: Extract first place_id and test details endpoint
echo "\n\n3. Testing place details with valid place ID..."
# You'll need to manually extract a place_id from step 2 output
# Example with a sample place ID:
curl -X GET "$BASE_URL/place/ChIJN1t_tDeuEmsRUsoyG83frY4"

# Test 4: Test with invalid place ID
echo "\n\n4. Testing with invalid place ID..."
curl -X GET "$BASE_URL/place/invalid_place_id_test"

echo "\n\nTest completed!"
